shortdesc.ph: Occurs when a specific remote user enables/disables the video module.

dlentry.dd:
Deprecated as of v2.4.1. This callback has been deprecated, please use the callback instead:
(0) and (5).
(2) and (6).

section.p: Occurs when a specific remote user enables/disables the video module. Once the video module is disabled, the remote user can only use a voice call. The remote user cannot send or receive any video from other users.
This callback is triggered by the remote user calling the or method to turn on or turn off the video module.

plentry.pd: User ID of the remote user sending the video streams.

ul.li: true: Enable. The remote user can enter a video session. Once enabled, the user can make video calls or live broadcasts.
false: Disable. Once the video module is disabled, the remote user can only use a voice call. The remote user cannot send or receive any video from other users.
